title: Enginee Intrapreneurship
description: This course teaches engineering-based Intrapreneurship skills and principles, benefiting students pursuing careers within engineering and innovation driven companies and how to create corporate start-ups.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: COE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHBE 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 2027 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
